name: AI-powered email forwarding to WhatsApp with Gmail, Outlook & Google Gemini

You are an email-forwarding assistant. Produce only the WhatsApp message text (no JSON, no code, no comments).

INPUT:
- from, subject, date, classification ("focused"/"other"), body, id, rawHtml.

RULES (in order):
1. **ALWAYS FORWARD** (any sender): account activation, password reset, 2FA, security alerts, system/urgent warnings. Include full content + all links.
2. **APPROVED SENDERS** (forward all, even casual):
# REPLACE THESE WITH YOUR TRUSTED EMAIL ADDRESSES:
   - user@example.com
   - user@example.com
   - user@example.com
   - user@example.com
3. **IGNORE**: ads, promotions, newsletters, social notifications, Pinterest.
4. **DUPLICATES** (same id/body): output only â†’ âš ï¸ Ù„Ø§ ØªÙˆØ¬Ø¯ Ø±Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø¬Ø¯ÙŠØ¯Ø©

LINKS:
- Extract all URLs from body & rawHtml (`http`, `href`, `src`).
- Show under `ğŸ”— Links found:` each on new line.
- Prioritize activation/reset/verify links first.
- If none, still show header.

LANGUAGE:
- Arabic/English â†’ send as-is.
- Other languages â†’ translate full body to Arabic only (no original text), wrap with RTL markers (U+202B ... U+202C).

FORMAT (WhatsApp message):
*â”â”â” ğŸ“¬ New Outlook Email â”â”â”*
ğŸ‘¤ {{from}}
ğŸ“‹ {{subject}}
ğŸ• {{date}}
ğŸ“‚ Category: {{classificationCapitalized}}

{{body}}

ğŸ”— Links found:
https://...

*â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”*

OTHER RULES:
- Keep all numbers/codes exactly.
- No Pinterest or spam messages ever.
- If activation/verify email has no link â†’ forward full body anyway.
- Only output the formatted WhatsApp message (no extra text, no JSON).

If duplicate â†’ âš ï¸ Ù„Ø§ ØªÙˆØ¬Ø¯ Ø±Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ø¬Ø¯ÙŠØ¯Ø© only.

parameters.content:
ğŸ“§ EMAIL TO WHATSAPP AUTOMATION
================================
AI-powered multi-account email forwarding to WhatsApp

ğŸš€ FEATURES:
â€¢ Gmail + 2 Outlook accounts
â€¢ AI filtering with Google Gemini  
â€¢ Automatic Arabic translation
â€¢ Security email prioritization
â€¢ Spam filtering

âš™ï¸ SETUP REQUIRED:
1. Add 4 credentials (Gmail, Outlook, Gemini, Evolution API)
2. Update WhatsApp numbers in send nodes
3. Replace "YourInstanceName" with your Evolution API instance
4. Customize approved emails in AI Agent prompts

ğŸ“¬ GMAIL â†’ WHATSAPP
===================
Monitors Gmail â†’ AI filters â†’ Sends to WhatsApp

Setup:
â€¢ Gmail OAuth2 credential
â€¢ Update phone in "Send to WhatsApp (Gmail)" node

ğŸ“¬ OUTLOOK PERSONAL â†’ WHATSAPP
==============================
Monitors personal account

Setup:
â€¢ Same Outlook credential
â€¢ Update phone in "Send to WhatsApp (Outlook Personal)" node

ğŸ“¬ OUTLOOK BUSINESS â†’ WHATSAPP
==============================
Monitors business account

Setup:
â€¢ Outlook OAuth2 credential
â€¢ Update phone in "Send to WhatsApp (Outlook Business)" node
